category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA113_AW_preview_enable
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to activate Teamcenter Active Workspace Summary page in place of classic TCAA preview in all TCAA browser dialogs. Possible values: 0 - use classic TCAA preview (Default) 1 - use Teamcenter Active Workspace Summary page to realize preview in TCAA browser dialogs
